title: Fix incorrect ASIN, price, and product name display

requirements.summary: Verify ProductCard component correctly displays productName field from Product data structure
acceptanceCriteria: ProductCard displays the productName field as the primary heading
Product names are visible and properly formatted on all product cards
No empty, null, or placeholder values appear in the product name position

file_operations.description: Verify that the component correctly reads and displays product.productName as the primary heading. Ensure the productName field is rendered with proper null/undefined checks and fallback handling. Add console logging during development to verify productName values are being received from the backend. Ensure the text is visible, properly truncated if needed, and styled consistently with the card design.
